review: Compared to Google chromecast I would rather use the Firestick. I like that it comes with a remote and that I don't have to store the apps on my phone like I do with the Chromecast. The video quality also seems to be better. I have the fire stick on a tv on the opposite side of the house than the router and only have a video quality problem when running too many things on our WiFi. I also only use spotify to listen to music and Firestick has this available whereas Chromecast does not.
